**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 35 1.1 **Price** 4,500 gp **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 **Base Weapon** [Warhammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=47) --- The [Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16) word for “repent” is etched in golden lettering on the shaft of this _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [merciful](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1869) [mithral](/Equipment.aspx?ID=377) [warhammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=47)_. An evil-aligned creature is [enfeebled 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) when carrying or wielding this weapon. **Redeemer Wielder** If you're a [champion](/Classes.aspx?ID=4) of the [redeemer](/Causes.aspx?ID=2) cause, you also gain the following two benefits.
  • When you critically hit an evil creature with the _blessed reformer_, until the end of your next turn, the target takes a –10-foot penalty to its Speeds and can't Step.
  • You can Activate the weapon in the following way.
**Craft Requirements** You're a champion with the redeemer cause. The initial materials must include 140 gp of [mithral](/Equipment.aspx?ID=275).
name: Blessed Reformer
